name: Sky Play App
description:
Sky Play is the most fun for kids, In the palm of their hands they can tap, move, and hear objects that appear in the Sky. This app was intended to maintain the attention of Babies, Toddlers, and young Children. Baby Learn Online is dedicated to Early Childhood Development and creating a Learning and Cognitive environment was the intention of this application, another fun feature of this application is that it promotes Movement and Learning during User Interaction. As the Device is moved, objects move in the Sky; don’t worry if you catch a kid swaying from Side to Side trying to catch one of the objects on screen. Free of Ads let your little joy Play in the Sky! And don’t forget You never know what may appear in the Sky!



Benefits:

• Physical Activity

• Attention Span Development

• Mobile Device Interaction

• Imagination and Creativity Development




Baby Learn Online, Technology and Products that enhances the lifestyles of Children. Please visit https://babylearnonline.com for more information on what we’re doing for children around the world.
